name: Gravity At Its Finest 2
description: Gravity At Its Finest 2 is a fast paced arcade game where the player is in control of a falling cube and has to avoid obstacles and collect coins. Stages become more and more complex and the falling cube gets faster as you progress further into the game. Collect coins to get more points and check out how far can you get while free falling. There are tons of unique shapes standing on your way and you have to avoid them all. Be careful and get free fallin'!
